name: King Draco, Ruler of the Dracoslayers
text:
2+ Pendulum Monsters including a "Draco" monster
If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it and if you do add 1 "Draco" card from your Deck to your hand. Once per turn: You can return 1 "Draco" monster in your GY to the Deck; apply the appropriate effect depending on the monster returned:
●Fusion Monster: Special Summon up to 2 "Dracoslayer" Pendulum Monsters from your hand and/or GY to zones this card points to.
●Synchro Monster: Special Summon up to 2 "Dracoslayer" Pendulum Monsters from your Deck to zones this card points to.
●Xyz Monster: Special Summon up to 2 "Dracoslayer" Pendulum Monster from face-up in your Extra Deck to zones this card points to. 
You cannot Link Summon for the rest of the turn after activating either of this card’s effects.
